title: The Private life of a starling
creator_credit: Ronald and Rosemary Eastman, Jeffery Boswall and BBC
brief_description: Examines the life cycle of a pair of starlings. A unique sequence shows how they use ants to rid their feathers of lice as well as some impressive aerial manoeuvres by a migrating flock.
creator_credit_for_label: Ronald and Rosemary Eastman, Jeffery Boswall and BBC
